name: js-framework-house
description: house for building all your projects

scripts.folderSetup: npm run i angular @angular/cli; npm run i ember ember-cli; npm run i vue @vue/cli; npm run i cra create-react-app; npm run i preact preact-cli
scripts.i: run(){ mkdir $1; cp .$1.json $1/package.json; cd $1; npm install $2 --save; }; run
